recipesJson.name: 1 2 3 Poinsettia
recipesJson.author: hibbadoray
recipesJson.description: A Poinsettia is a cocktail made with orange liqueur, cranberry juice and champagne. 1-2-3 style.

reviews.text: That is a frightening amount of Morning Mimosa, but the tartness of the cranberry and the candy sweetness of the FW Pink Champagne cleans up nicely and makes an awesome simple recipe that really tastes like the picture. Pushing the Mimosa so high gives it a zesty orange top note like the picture. Thereâ€™s plenty of both orange and cranberry flavors and a sweet champagne base, and that cranberry tartness comes back around in the finish. Overall, just a fantastic combination of three ingredients that tastes like more than that because the Mimosa is so complex. Bravo!
